Haloperidol

Mechanism of Action

Indications

Post-operative Nausea and VomitingPost-operative Nausea and Vomiting
General Principles

Anti-emetic medications are given routinely during anesthesia.
Combining agents of different classes reduces side effects and improves anti-emetic action


Risk Factors for ...

Dosage

Post-operative Nausea and VomitingPost-operative Nausea and Vomiting
General Principles

Anti-emetic medications are given routinely during anesthesia.
Combining agents of different classes reduces side effects and improves anti-emetic action


Risk Factors for ...

  • 0.5 - 1 mg IV at the beginning or end of surgery

    Complications

  • QTC prolongation
